name: KKLD
description:
We have a deep understanding of the challenge the shift from traditional to digital poses not only to brands and publishers, but to enterprises and businesses around the world.
We support our clients in finding new business opportunities like we did with BMW i Ventures, investing in the development of disruptive mobility services.
Our international team of 50 strategists and creatives hails from 14 countries and is based in Berlin and New York City.
